item.description:
WHEN: 12 - 5pm
( meetup just outside the wine shop by the pond)

COST: Free


BOLTON BANDS & BREWS FESTIVAL

Bring your blankets and lawn chairs for a relaxing fun day of music in the orchard. featuring some of Bolton's best local performers. Great views! Great foliage! Great brews!
Great Food! Great Wine! make this a day not to be missed!
Enjoy some of Nashoba Valley Winery's best beers while you listen to live music cascading from the picturesque gazebo.
* I've been told this festival is a real good time! If it's anything like the Apple Festival, there will be quite a crowd! It's a great way to spend a Sunday afternoon. Members of the Merrimack Valley Connection Meetup Group will also be going.
NOTE* if you are going, you should pack a cooler with a picnic lunch or snacks. At the last festival the food sold out quickly. We so wished we had done that!
There will be the usual wine tasting bar... featuring many of their delicious wines
item.name: BOLTON BANDS & BREWS FESTIVAL @ Nashoba Valley Winery
